channel.title: Java issues
channel.description:
I'm having java issues and i get the error of
exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdefFounderror:server caused by: java.lang.classnotfoundexception:server
could not find main class:server 'ping' is not a recognized internal or external command,operable program or batch file
i know how to set environmental variables but last time i did them was 6 months ago i stopped private servers and now im back into them.
[IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/4296/cmda.jpg[/img]

item.title: Java issues
item.dc:creator: @new2servers new2servers
item.description:
@new2servers wrote:

I’m having java issues and i get the error of

exception in thread “main” java.lang.noclassdefFounderror:server caused by: java.lang.classnotfoundexception:server

could not find main class:server
‘ping’ is not a recognized internal or external command,operable program or batch file

i know how to set environmental variables but last time i did them was 6 months ago i stopped private servers and now im back into them.

Read full topic
